content.p: The Graduate School of University of Nottingham Malaysia (UNM) is pleased to announce the 1st UNM Postgraduate and Early Career Researcher Conference to be held on 6 and 7 December 2022 at Kuala Lumpur Teaching Centre, University of Nottingham Malaysia. The aim of this conference is to bring together research scholars from multiple disciplines in the arts and sciences to share their research work towards nurturing impactful research for the future. We invite contributions from postgraduate and early career research scholars based in Malaysia and the region. Among the activities in this conference are keynote speeches, PhD colloquiums, postgraduate research and journal publications workshops. Best paper presenters will be given cash rewards and certificates while accepted extended abstracts will be published as conference proceeding with ISBN number. 29 and 30 November 2022 The University of Nottingham Teaching Centre Level 2, Chulan Tower No.3 Jalan Conlay 50450 Kuala Lumpur Malaysia RM150 Registration here graduateschool@nottingham.edu.my Dr Maniam Kaliannan, Associate Professor of Human Resource Management and Associate Dean of Graduate School, University of Nottingham Malaysia Dr Maniam Kaliannan Chair of the Organising Committee Nurturing Impactful Research for the Future Extended abstract should not be more than 500 words and should include brief intro, aim of paper, methodology, findings, discussion, conclusion and references. You may add graph/charts/tables etc. Interested authors with accepted abstracts for the conference can submit their full papers to the journals listed below after the conference for publication considerations (subject to journal review process): telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
